channel.title: Ben Nevis on Coffee now
channel.description: Recent content in Ben Nevis on Coffee now

item.title: West Highland Way (IV): Ben Nevis and home
item.description: Having reached Fort William in 5 days, I was definitely hoping to climb Ben Nevis but was a bit unsure whether it would be a good idea after the days spent hiking. After my first ‘full’ breakfast of the trip at the BnB, I decided to first deal with where my ‘no plan plan’ was going to meet the rigid schedule of the railways…

item.title: West Highland Way (III): Bridge of Orchy to the end
item.description: As we left the story of my adventure on the West Highland Way, it was 10 pm and I had just set up at the wild camping zone at the Bridge of Orchy having covered 104.3 km of the 154 km trail in 3 days of walking. This meant we now had the wildest section of the route to go…
